entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
